@Jennyoleary90 @RhiannonSarahC ok, I think this a dead end. Best x
@RhiannonSarahC the outcome of the circumstances is irrelevant?
2/2 @Jennyoleary90 @RhiannonSarahC especially when factually, it's incorrect. I'm a cover myself, but don't get this one at all.
@Jennyoleary90 @RhiannonSarahC 1/2 and you understand my point that just because you say something is your opinion doesn't make it right
@Jennyoleary90 @RhiannonSarahC unforeseen circumstances, means literally, the circumstances are unforeseen, don't see any negativity?
@Jennyoleary90 @RhiannonSarahC actually some opinions are incorrect. If I have the opinion that the world is flat, is that opinion correct?
@RhiannonSarahC well that's incorrect. The phrase 'unforeseen circumstances' doesn't insinuate any negativity, it just means what it says ðŸ‘Œ
@RhiannonSarahC @WestEndCovers @WestEnd333 it only says that the circumstances were unforeseen, nothing negative at all?
